metadata.description: Letter to Major General Basilio Valdes from Major Stanley Lambert on a lecture to be given by the former for the Civilian Censorship School at Holy Infant Convent, 2nd floor classroom, 7 November 1944, time: 14:30
metadata.subject: Basilio Valdes; World War II; official papers; letters; Secretary of National Defense and Communications
metadata.title: Letter to Major General Basilio Valdes from Major Stanley Lambert on a lecture to be given by the former for the Civilian Censorship School
